messageNoFoundsExplanation: Please reduce your bet to continue playing.
pays_malfunction_voids: Malfunction voids all pays and plays.
pays_wild: • WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER Symbol.
pays_wildM: • WILD symbol substitutes for all symbols except SCATTER Symbol.
scatter_defintion:
• Scatter symbol appears on all reels.
  • 3 or more scatter symbols in any position trigger 10 Free Spins.
  • Additionally, if 3 or more scatter symbols appear again during the Free Spins round, it will retrigger 5 more Free Spins.
auto_play_limit_loss: Autoplay suspended as you reached your loss limit
reality_check_msg: You have been playing for {minutes}. Do you want to continue?
bet_not_available: The Bet is not available now. Please refresh and play again.
general_rule:
• The game has 20 fixed lines.
  • The overall game theoretical RTP is rtp.
  • Observed maximum win: hpbm times total bet.
  • Observed probability of hitting maximum win: hpp.
  • All wins pay left to right.
  • Payouts are made according to the Paytable.
  • Wild substitutes for all other symbols except Scatter.
  • The game is played with a dynamic paytable.
  • Simultaneous or coinciding wins on different paylines are cumulative.
  • Malfunction voids all pays and plays.

, Please reload the game.
messageRGBlockedErrorExplanation:
This game is unavailable because a responsible gaming control is in place.
Please check your settings or contact us, if you believe it to be incorrect
messageGenericErrorTitle:
Apologies
It looks like something did not work, but there is no need for concern.

messagePlaySessionNotFoundErrorExplanati:
Apologies
This error may have been caused by you opening this game on more than one browser tab or device. This is not supported. In this case, please close this browser window and continue playing on the active window.
Free_game_text:
• 3 or more Scatter symbols in any position trigger 10 Free Spins.
  • Free Spins can be retriggered.
  • Free Spins are played with the same amount of lines and bet value as the triggering spin.
buy_text: The FREE SPINS round can be instantly triggered from the base game by buying it for 25X the current total bet.
